relnotes.name: BUILDSYSTEMTOOLS

defect.title: scanlog module name is not case consistent

relnotes.defect: Renamed scanlog.pm to Scanlog.pm. Updated PRJ_EXPORTS for Scanlog.pm.

defect.title: Exports fail on Linux due to wrong filename / directory case

relnotes.defect: Exports fail on Linux due to wrong filename / directory case
relnotes.minorchange: Removed graphics_graphicssurfaces unit, which is an obsolete prototype implementation. The "Graphics Surfaces" component remains in the model, and will eventually contain the production implementation of this feature.

Enable additional components in the v9.5 configuration. The extra components are in the graphics subsystem, associated with PREQ1004 (egl, eglheader, openvg, openvgheaders) and PREQ1007 (graphicssurfaces).
